rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance leading to the living areas and central courtyard.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious area adjacent to the central courtyard for social gatherings, with ample natural light.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room; designed for family meals and interaction.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen with modern amenities, ensuring efficient workflow and safety according to local building codes.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Private bedroom with attached en-suite bathroom; ideally placed in the northeast direction as per Vastu for calm energy.

rooms.name: Guest Bedrooms
rooms.description: Two well-appointed bedrooms designed to accommodate guests. Both positioned in a harmonious layout respecting Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: Additional bedroom suite for extended family or staff, placed strategically on the west side to balance energy flow.

openings.description: Main entrance door providing security and aesthetic appeal in line with local architectural norms.
Large windows to let natural light and ensure a connection with the central courtyard.
Ventilation window ensuring proper air circulation.
Provides access from the interior living spaces to the central courtyard, promoting natural light and energy flow.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom
rooms.description: Extra bedroom on the upper level, maintaining privacy and following Vastu for balanced energy.

rooms.name: Bathroom (Shared)
rooms.description: Shared bathroom facilities designed to be practical and in compliance with local building codes.

openings.description: Internal staircase connecting ground floor to the first floor, ensuring easy access and adherence to safety norms.
Small window for natural light while maintaining privacy.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: Expansive terrace offering panoramic views, designed for relaxation and gatherings with adherence to local regulations and safety standards.

openings.description: Access ladder connecting the first floor to the rooftop terrace, ensuring compliance with safety and building norms.
